atk-abh03a2:3_1: Idāni pañcakkhandhādivasena nikkhittamātikaṁ ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīhi nayamātikāpadehi saddhiṁ yojetvā
atk-abh03a2:3_2: dassetuṁ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a2:3_5: tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a2:3_7: Yasmā ca ‘‘sabhāgo visabhāgo’’ti evaṁ lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-abh03a2:3_8: tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:3_11: Yañhi kiñci rūpaṁ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṁ gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva gaṇitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:3_14: Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti,
atk-abh03a2:3_17: Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi ekādasahi etāsu hi apariyāpannaṁ rūpaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:4_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a2:4_1: Vissajjane panassa yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā,
atk-abh03a2:4_7: ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī’’tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā,
atk-abh03a2:4_15: ‘‘pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehī’’ti evaṁ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni.
atk-abh03a2:6_1: Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ ekena khandhenāti ekena rūpakkhandheneva,
atk-abh03a2:6_2: ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:6_4: Asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṁ dhammāyatanaṁ nāma nibbānaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:6_9: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṁ na saṅgayhati.
atk-abh03a2:6_16: Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṁ dassetvā ‘‘dvādasāyatanānī’’ti abhedatova pucchāvissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:7_3: Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:10_2: ‘‘avijjā katihi khandhehī’’ti pucchaṁ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhenāti evaṁ vissajjanameva dassitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_3: Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti paṭisandhiyaṁ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_7: Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito.
atk-abh03a2:10_9: Aññeneva hi ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito,
atk-abh03a2:10_13: Tattha kammabhavo phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṁ ekato dassito.
atk-abh03a2:10_15: Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā ‘‘ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:11_8: Ekatalavāsikānañhi sesabrahmānaṁ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uddhaṭaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:13_5: Cittaṁ pana cetanānantaraṁ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:13_6: Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:13_8: sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṁ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:15_1: Evaṁ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:15_3: Sattahi dhātūhīti cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇadhātūhi ceva manodhātudhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi ca.
atk-abh03a2:15_4: Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṁ tāhiyeva.
atk-abh03a2:15_5: Vipākadhammadhammā pana saṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikehi saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā.
atk-abh03a2:15_7: evaṁ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ yena yena padena saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a2:15_8: taṁ taṁ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṁ gahetvā vissajjitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_1: Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:18_4: khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṁ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:18_5: tassa khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_8: So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:18_11: Evaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:18_12: Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṁ arūpena asammissaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:23_2: Pañhavasena hi imasmiṁ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā eko pañho kato,
atk-abh03a2:23_9: sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:23_13: aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:24_2: Tasmiṁ saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:24_9: tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a2:25_2: yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena asaṅgahito nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a2:25_4: Ettha pana catūhi khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi.
atk-abh03a2:25_6: Dvādasahi dhātūhīti yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi.
atk-abh03a2:26_3: Itthindriyapurisindriyesu pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṁ dve āyatanāni,
atk-abh03a2:26_4: dhammadhātuyā ca saddhiṁ aṭṭha dhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:27_3: Tesu hi bhavesu rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dveva āyatanāni tehi saṅgahitāni .
atk-abh03a2:27_4: Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni teheva ca dvīhi,
atk-abh03a2:27_5: manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a2:27_6: Navahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātudhammadhātūhi saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:28_4: Dhātuyopi tesaṁyeva ekekena saddhiṁ satta viññāṇadhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:29_4: Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a2:29_8: Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava dhātuyo saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:29_10: Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni dve āyatanāni ,
atk-abh03a2:29_15: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:30_3: Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:34_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi saṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:34_4: tassa khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:34_6: Rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:34_7: Tesu tena ekadhammopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:34_15: Tesu tena ekopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:34_16: Evaṁ saṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni cakkhāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:34_17: Yāni pana padāni viññāṇena vā oḷārikarūpena vā asammissaṁ dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpenti,
atk-abh03a2:35_0: ‘‘Tayo khandhā tathā saccā, indriyāni ca soḷasa;
atk-abh03a2:39_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:40_1: vedanākkhandhena hi nibbānañca sukhumarūpasaññāsaṅkhārā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:40_9: Saññākkhandhapakkhe panettha saññaṁ apanetvā vedanāya saddhiṁ tayo khandhā saṅkhārādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ
atk-abh03a2:41_2: Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:42_2: Rūpārūpajīvitindriyena hi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:44_2: Jhānena pana nibbānaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ saññā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:44_3: Tasmā taṁ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṁ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:48_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādīhi saṅgahitena khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:48_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:48_4: Taṁ khandhāyatanadhātūsu ekampi sakalakoṭṭhāsaṁ gahetvā ṭhitapadesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:48_5: Sakalena hi khandhādipadena aññaṁ khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a2:48_6: yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:48_7: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:48_8: Yāni pana padāni saṅkhārekadesaṁ vā aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti –
atk-abh03a2:48_9: vedanekadesaṁ vā sukhumarūpaṁ vā saddekadesaṁ vā,
atk-abh03a2:51_3: te dhamme sandhāya sabbattha ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:51_5: samudayasaccena hi taṇhāvajjā sesā saṅkhārā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:51_7: Sā taṇhā puna saṅkhāreheva khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a2:51_9: Arūpadhammapucchāsu panettha saṅkhārakkhandho vā vedanākkhandho vā eko khandho nāma.
atk-abh03a2:54_1: Idāni asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:54_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādīhi asaṅgahitena khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:54_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:54_4: Taṁ pañcakkhandhaggāhakesu dukkhasaccādīsu viññāṇena saddhiṁ sukhumarūpaggāhakesu anidassanaappaṭighādīsu ca padesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:54_5: Tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:54_7: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:54_8: Yāni pana pañcakkhandhe viññāṇañca sukhumarūpena saddhiṁ ekato na dīpenti,
atk-abh03a2:58_0: Gocchake sattati dve ca, satta cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:60_0: Aṭṭhāraseva ñātabbā, sesā idha na bhāsitā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:61_0: Pañhā panettha sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena samodhānetvā katihi saddhiṁ sabbepi catuttiṁsa honti.
atk-abh03a2:61_3: te dhamme sandhāya ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:62_1: rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā nibbānañca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_2: Āyatanadhātusaṅgahena pana ṭhapetvā viññāṇaṁ avasesā saṅgahitāti viññāṇameva tīhipi khandhasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitaṁ nāma.
atk-abh03a2:62_3: Puna tena viññāṇena saddhiṁ nibbānena cattāro khandhā khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_4: Te sabbepi puna viññāṇeneva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti ekena khandhena,
atk-abh03a2:62_6: sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā nāma honti. Atha vā –
atk-abh03a2:62_7: yadetaṁ rūpakkhandhena viññāṇameva tīhi khandhādisaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:62_8: tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_9: Puna te rūpadhammā viññāṇeneva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_14: Iminā upāyena sabbattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:62_20: Te ca dve khandhā ekādasāyatanāni sattarasa dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh03a2:63_0: 195. Tatiyapañhe – viññāṇaṁ rūpādīhi catūhi asaṅgahitanti tesaṁ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_2: cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti iminā nayena sabbattha khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_4: rūpañca dhammāyatananti uddānagāthāya dassitadhammāyeva aññenākārena saṅkhipitvā dassitāti.
atk-abh03a2:67_2: Tattha yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:67_7: sabhāgo visabhāgoti hi vacanato catūhi arūpakkhandheheva sabhāgānaṁ ekasantānasmiṁ ekakkhaṇe uppannānaṁ
atk-abh03a2:67_10: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_14: evaṁ bhinnasantānehi nānākkhaṇikehi arūpadhammehipi saddhiṁ natthiyeva.
atk-abh03a2:67_16: Ayaṁ pana visabhāgatā saṅgahaṭṭhena virujjhanato saṅgahanaye natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_20: Evamettha yassa ekadhammenapi sampayogalakkhaṇaṁ na yujjhati,
atk-abh03a2:67_21: tassa pucchāya saṅgahaṁ katvāpi natthīti paṭikkhepo kato.
atk-abh03a2:67_24: Yāni pana padāni sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutte rūpena nibbānena vā missakadhamme dīpenti,
atk-abh03a2:67_25: tāni sabbathāpi idha na yujjantīti na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:71_0: Gocchakesu ca paññāsa, aṭṭha cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:73_0: Tevīsa padasataṁ etaṁ, sampayoge na labbhatī’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:74_0: Dhammāyatanañhi rūpanibbānamissakattā tasmiṁ apariyāpannena viññāṇenapi na sakkā sampayuttanti vattuṁ.
atk-abh03a2:74_4: Evaṁ sabbatthāpi etāni na yujjantīti idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:74_5: Sesāni khandhādīni yujjantīti tāni gahetvā ekekavasena ca samodhānena ca pañhavissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:75_5: Evaṁ sabbattha rūpassa vippayoge dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu arūpaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:76_5: Ādipañhasmiñhi sarūpato dassetvā parato pāḷi saṁkhittā.
atk-abh03a2:77_0: 234.Soḷasahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu tāva attānaṁ ṭhapetvā chahi viññāṇadhātūhi,
atk-abh03a2:78_6: Etesu hi taṁ saccadvayaṁ kehici sampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:80_2: sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṁ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:80_3: Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṁ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:82_0: 257. Kusalapañhe – kusalehi catunnampi khandhānaṁ gahitattā sampayogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a2:84_12: pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:85_2: Kehicīti ye tattha parittārammaṇā na honti, tehi.
atk-abh03a2:85_3: Dhammadhātu pana parittārammaṇānaṁ channaṁ cittuppādānaṁ vasena catūhi khandhehi saṅgahitattā paṭhamapaṭikkhepameva bhajati.
atk-abh03a2:86_7: Sahetukā ceva na ca hetūpi pītisahagatasadisāva.
atk-abh03a2:89_3: imasmiñhi vāre pucchāya uddhaṭapadena ye dhammā sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:89_5: tesaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:89_8: Tasmā tañca aññāni ca evarūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:89_9: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme viññāṇañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti,
atk-abh03a2:96_3: tāni uppaṭipāṭiyāpi samodhānetvā tattha vedanākkhandhādikā pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:96_10: te dhammā na kehicīti te pucchāya uddhaṭapadaṁ viññāṇadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā sesā cha viññāṇadhātudhammā, rūpaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:96_12: Tehi sabbesaṁ khandhāyatanānaṁ saṅgahitattā na kehici khandhehi āyatanehi vā vippayuttā.
atk-abh03a2:96_13: Ekāya dhātuyāti yā yā pucchāya uddhaṭā hoti tāya tāya.
atk-abh03a2:97_3: Iminā nayena sabbattha pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasena attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:100_3: Rūpakkhandhena hi vippayuttā nāma cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh03a2:100_9: Iti pucchāya moghattā sabbavissajjanesu natthi natthiicceva vuttanti.
atk-abh03a2:103_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:103_4: Taṁ rūpena vā rūpamissakehi vā sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi vā padehi saddhiṁ na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:103_5: Rūpena hi rūpamissakena vā aññesaṁ sampayogo natthi.
atk-abh03a2:103_6: Sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi sabbesaṁ sampayogārahānaṁ khandhādīnaṁ gahitattā aññaṁyeva natthi,
atk-abh03a2:103_8: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:103_9: Yāni pana padāni rūpena asammissaṁ arūpekadesaṁ dīpenti,
atk-abh03a2:110_0: Sabbapañhesu pana ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a2:110_3: Vedanākkhandhena hi itare tayo khandhā sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:113_2: Tattha ye sampayogavippayogapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a2:113_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:116_2: Tattha ye saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese samudayasaccādayova dhammā uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a2:116_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:116_5: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a2:116_6: tesaṁ yehi sampayogo vā vippayogo vā hoti,
atk-abh03a2:117_1: samudayasaccena tāva saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:117_5: saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṁ sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:120_2: Tattha ye sampayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese vedanākkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a2:120_4: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:120_5: tesaṁ yehi saṅgaho vā asaṅgaho vā hoti,
atk-abh03a2:121_5: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a2:124_2: Tattha ye pañcame asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā,
atk-abh03a2:124_5: Sesā pana na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:124_6: Vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena pana rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti.
atk-abh03a2:124_10: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭadhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a2:124_11: te yehi sampayuttā ca vippayuttā ca,
atk-abh03a2:125_1: rūpakkhandhena tāva viññāṇameva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:125_7: Taṁ sandhāya te dhammā tīhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:128_2: Tattha yesaṁ padānaṁ vippayogo na ruhati,
atk-abh03a2:128_6: Dhammāyatanassa hi khandhādīsu ekenāpi vippayogo na ruhati.
atk-abh03a2:134_0: Cha padāni tato uddhaṁ sabbānipi samāsato;
atk-abh03a2:135_0: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:136_1: dhammāyatanaṁ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṁ dīpetuṁ vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:136_2: Imāni pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti.
atk-abh03a2:143_0: Ñātuṁ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:144_0: Ekekassa pana sace, padassa vitthārameva bhāseyyaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:145_0: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṁ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
atk-abh03a2:146_0: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṁ tantiyā mayā etaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:147_0: Kurunā pattaṁ puññaṁ, sukhāya taṁ hotu lokassāti.
